item.Name: Use 3rd Person Camera When Active
Hide Reticle When Active
Is Motion Tracked (By Enemies) When Active
One-Shot Activation Effect#Effect kills itself rather than being explicitly killed when the ability deactivates
Can be activated when weapon state is relaxed
Does Not Appear In Extended Motion Tracker Range

_field_real_fraction.name: activation energy cost#amount of energy required to activate the ability

_field_real.name: active energy consumption:energy/second#amount of energy consumed continuously while the ability is active

_field_tag_reference_64.name: activation effect#effects triggered when player activates ability

item.Name: allow build up whilst airborne
enable stopping power
enable stopping power in campaign
pause damage section recharge#when sprinting prevents the damage section recharging (N.B. not the same as the stun timer)
zero sprint fraction when engaging combat actions#firing, throwing grenades, etc.
Normal
Suspend
Reset

_field_real.name: evade delay time#how long after evading before the sprint fraction starts building up again
seconds to full speed#how long to reach top speed

_field_custom.name: time to full speed:seconds#how long to reach top speed

_field_struct.name: time to full speed:seconds#how long to reach top speed

item.Name: sequential#applies the percentages one after another on the base
total percentage#adds up all of the percentages and applies them to the base
addition#adds on all of the modifiers to the base
product#multiplies the values one after another on to the base

_field_real.name: falloff time:seconds#amount of time it takes for effects of sprint (speed, look speed, and strafe scale) to wear off after exiting sprint

plugin._field_explanation: Determines how speed multiplier increases from sprint initiation (0 on x axis) to full speed (1 on x axis). Y axis is percentage of full speed multiplier applied.

_field_real.name: full speed multiplier#how much faster we actually go when at full sprint

_field_custom.name: full speed scalar#how much faster we actually go when at full sprint

_field_struct.name: full speed scalar#how much faster we actually go when at full sprint

item.Name: sequential#applies the percentages one after another on the base
total percentage#adds up all of the percentages and applies them to the base
addition#adds on all of the modifiers to the base
product#multiplies the values one after another on to the base

plugin._field_explanation: Determines how look velocity scale (both yaw and pitch) moves from 1.0 to full sprint scale as sprint is ramping up to full speed.

_field_real.name: yaw velocity scale at full sprint#scale applied to yaw velocity when sprinting at full speed
pitch velocity scale at full sprint#scale applied to pitch velocity when sprinting at full speed

plugin._field_explanation: Determines how maximum strafe throttle magnitude moves from 1.0 to full sprint cap as sprint is ramping up to full speed.

_field_real.name: max strafe throttle magnitude at full sprint#cap applied to strafe throttle magnitude at full sprint
pegged magnitude#how far the stick needs to be pressed before being considered pegged
pegged magnitude (legacy presets)#in legacy you don't get left/right throttle inputs only forward/back (default = 0.3)

_field_angle.name: pegged angular threshold#how far off straight up we consider pegged
max angle between facing and velocity:degrees#if facing deviates from velocity by more than this threshold, player is kicked out of sprint

_field_real.name: minimum player velocity to be considered in a sprinting state:world units per second

plugin._field_explanation: Determines how damage corresponds to sprint fraction reduction - takes a normalized damage (think percentage of shield) as the input and maps to the amount of speed fraction that should be removed.

There are some networking implications to this value such that we don't really want it to be too small. It currently relies on the damage state being send across from the authority and if this time value is too small it might be possible to miss out on some updates. Would suggest avoid going any lower than 1.5 for now.

_field_real.name: damage recharge delay timer#how long after taking damage before you can start to build up sprint

_field_real_fraction.name: damage reduction ignore threshold#only reduce sprint fraction from damage if the sprint fraction is <= this
damage reduction minimum#don't reduce the sprint fraction below this

_field_custom.name: exit animation speed scalar#scales the Spartan's sprint exit animation playback speed

_field_struct.name: exit animation speed scalar#scales the Spartan's sprint exit animation playback speed

item.Name: sequential#applies the percentages one after another on the base
total percentage#adds up all of the percentages and applies them to the base
addition#adds on all of the modifiers to the base
product#multiplies the values one after another on to the base
